attributes.action: STOP ALL 100 hour applications until the Health White Paper is implemented in 2011
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Due to many problems such as malpractice, directing of prescription, influencing practices and abuse of not opening 100 hour and lack of supervision by pcts. It has also opened where there is no nessary or desirability and leap frogging. WIth the Health Paper these pharmacies will be allowed to reduce their hours under the PNAs. See Dot pharmacy for information on 100 hours being able to apply to pcts to reduce hours to say 40 or 50 hours per week.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
